      • setPosition

        public void setPosition(int posX,
               int posY)
        sets the position of the sprite on the screen
        automatically makes the sprite visible and stops any animation
        Parameters:
        posX - the x coordinate of the sprite's position
        posY - the y coordinate of the sprite's position

      • animate

        public void animate(int speedX,
           int speedY)
        animates the sprite
        automatically makes the sprite visible
        Parameters:
        speedX - speed in pixel/sec along the x axis
        speedY - speed in pixel/sec along the y axis

      • animateTo

        public void animateTo(int toX,
             int toY,
             int durationInMsec)
        animates the sprite, moves it to a specific position on the screen
        automatically makes the sprite visible
        Parameters:
        toX - x coordinate of the sprite's end position
        toY - y coordinate of the sprite's end position
        durationInMsec - duration of the animation in msec

      • dontShow

        public void dontShow()
        makes the sprite invisible
